thread.title: Bad follow up
thread.title_full: Bad follow up - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 925darat
title: Bad follow up
text: Bad follow up - elevators move really slow so if you are in need of getting somewhere quick- don't plan on it- also- I left an expensive cord in my room- called the day I realized it and was told to leave a message. I did- 3 days in row- finally demanded a manager who walked in and found my cord. I had to have it shipped and by then I had to overnight it for $123! Could have been spared the expense....
